\section{Updating ImageJ plugins}

\subsection{Instructions:}

\begin{enumerate}
  \item Open ImageJ/ FIJI
  \item Go to "Help" on the far right. Scroll down and click "Update..."
    
      \begin{minipage}[t]{\linewidth}
      %test
        \raggedright
        \includegraphics[width=.8\linewidth]{/home/cb/gitrekt/itwasme-DIA/mules/docs/demo_imgs/scrot-morpho_01.png}%
        \medskip
      \end{minipage}
    
  \item Select "Manage update sites"
  
      \begin{minipage}[t]{\linewidth}   %https://tex.stackexchange.com/questions/46230/whats-the-best-way-to-include-graphics-in-an-enumerated-list
        \raggedright
        \includegraphics[width=.8\linewidth]{/home/cb/gitrekt/itwasme-DIA/mules/docs/demo_imgs/scrot-morpho_02.png}%
        \medskip
      \end{minipage}
      
  \item Scroll through the list and add "BioVoxxel" and "Morphology", then click "Apply Changes"
  
      \begin{minipage}[t]{\linewidth}   %https://tex.stackexchange.com/questions/46230/whats-the-best-way-to-include-graphics-in-an-enumerated-list
        \raggedright
        \includegraphics[width=.8\linewidth]{/home/cb/gitrekt/itwasme-DIA/mules/docs/demo_imgs/scrot-morpho_03.png}%
        \medskip
      \end{minipage}
  
  \item It should load some new files and give you a prompt to restart ImageJ/ FIJI. Restart ImageJ/ FIJI for the plugins to take effect.
  \item You should should now be able to use the "BioVoxxel" and "Morphology" plugins in your macros or through the menus ("Plugins" > "Morphology" > "Particles8")
  
      \begin{minipage}[t]{\linewidth}   %https://tex.stackexchange.com/questions/46230/whats-the-best-way-to-include-graphics-in-an-enumerated-list
        \raggedright
        \includegraphics[width=.8\linewidth]{/home/cb/gitrekt/itwasme-DIA/mules/docs/demo_imgs/scrot-morpho_04.png}%
        \medskip
      \end{minipage}

\end{enumerate}
